plot: Three people are separated by time, place, life and death. A son is reminded through a dream that they were once a family, torn and bound by a single tragedy.
title: Dream Cradle
plot_es: Three people are separated by time, place, life and death. A son is reminded through a dream that they were once a family, torn and bound by a single tragedy.
plot_en: Three people are separated by time, place, life and death. A son is reminded through a dream that they were once a family, torn and bound by a single tragedy.
